text: Vastavaniki ibrahim mariyu atanito unna varilo mi koraku oka manci adarsam undi. Varu tama jati varito ila annappudu: "Niscayanga, allah nu vadali miru aradhince vatito mariyu mito, maku elanti sambandham ledu. Memu mim'malni tyajincamu mariyu miru advitiyudaina allah nu visvasincananta varaku, maku miku madhya virodham mariyu dvesam untundi." Ika ibrahim tana tandrito: "Nenu tappaka ninnu ksamincamani (na prabhuvunu) vedukuntanu. Idi tappa, ni koraku allah nundi maremi ponde adhikaram naku ledu." Ani matrame anagaligadu. (Allah to ila prarthincadu): "O na prabhu! Memu ninne nam'mukunnamu mariyu ni vaipunake pascattapanto maralutunnamu mariyu ni vaipuke ma gamyasthanamundi
